copy.description: Everything you need to ship AI-powered FAQs that work globally and grow virally.
copy.title: FAQ features - Clickeen

copy.headline: Why the FAQ widget beats Elfsight, Typeform, and custom-built
copy.subheadline: Built from scratch for AI. Works globally. Grows virally. One FAQ, infinite possibilities.

copy.headline: AI editing: describe, done
copy.subheadline: Tell it what you want in plain English. 'Make the questions more casual' or 'add a section about pricing.' AI understands and executes instantly.

copy.headline: Global instant: any language, now
copy.subheadline: Geography is a parameter, not a project. Add Spanish, Japanese, or Arabic with one click. No manual translation, no delays.

copy.headline: Composable everywhere: one FAQ, infinite contexts
copy.subheadline: Same FAQ works in website, email, landing pages, ads. One source, infinite possibilities.

items.title: Instant personalized localization
items.body: Website URL → personalized content in 29 languages instantly. No manual translation, no translator costs. AI understands your business context.

items.title: Templates or pixel-perfect custom
items.body: Start with a curated template OR define everything yourself—your choice, total freedom. No compromises, no limitations.

items.title: Composable architecture
items.body: One FAQ works everywhere: website, email, landing pages, ads. Same content, infinite contexts. No rebuilding for each channel.

copy.headline: Built for AI, operated by AI
copy.body: Clickeen isn't just another FAQ builder—it's the first product designed for AI operation from day one. While competitors retrofit AI features, we built an architecture that AI agents can understand, modify, and optimize autonomously.

copy.title: How Clickeen's AI ecosystem works
copy.subhead: A complete platform that gets smarter with every interaction.

items.title: AI understands your intent
items.body: Describe changes naturally. 'Make it more professional' or 'add urgency to the CTA.' AI executes perfectly.

items.title: Global operation by default
items.body: AI handles localization, support, and marketing across all markets simultaneously.

items.title: Continuous learning and improvement
items.body: Every user interaction teaches the AI system, making all FAQs smarter over time.

items.title: Viral distribution automation
items.body: Free FAQs become marketing channels that automatically drive acquisition.

copy.title: Design control, down to the pixel
copy.subhead: Match your site and brand without compromise.

items.title: Layouts
items.body: Choose structure per breakpoint—accordion, list, or cards. Control spacing, density, and alignment so it feels native.

items.title: Appearance
items.body: Radius, borders, shadows, and surfaces that match your UI language. Make it look like it shipped with your product.

items.title: Typography
items.body: Role-based type styles that keep hierarchy clean. Headings, body, labels—tuned to your brand.

items.title: Instant localization
items.body: Ship in new languages without a translation project. Keep the experience consistent everywhere.

items.title: RTL ready
items.body: Support right-to-left languages without redesigning layouts. Directionality stays correct.

items.title: Locale-aware copy
items.body: Adapt tone and phrasing for the audience, not just the words. The content reads natural.

items.title: SEO foundations
items.body: Structured content that can be indexed when you need it. Make answers discoverable.

items.title: Governance
items.body: Strict contracts prevent drift. Changes are explicit, auditable, and repeatable.

items.title: Performance
items.body: Fast renders and sensible loading so the page stays smooth across devices and networks.

items.title: Fast
items.body: Lightweight embeds and lazy loading. No layout jank.

items.title: Reliable
items.body: Deterministic contracts and build gates keep shipping safe at scale.

items.title: Accessible
items.body: Clear hierarchy, readable type, and interaction patterns that work across input methods.

copy.headline: Experience the future of FAQs
copy.subheadline: The platform that gets smarter with every interaction. Built for the AI era.
